title: Step Configuration
description: All steps should have a defined configuration, this is how you define the step's behavior and how it will be triggered.

title: Event Subscription
description: This background job subscribes to the ts.pet.created event that gets emitted when a new pet is created.

title: Input Schema
description: Defines the structure of the event data that will be received when a pet is created.

title: Background Job Handler
description: The handler processes the pet creation event asynchronously, calculating feeding schedules and scheduling reminders.

title: Business Logic
description: Contains the core logic for determining feeding schedules based on pet age and species.

title: Event Emission
description: Emits events to trigger other parts of the workflow, such as scheduling feeding reminders.

title: Logging
description: Logs the background job execution for monitoring and debugging purposes.
